snippet.title: Sonder | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD FOR FREE ON STEAM: store.steampowered.com/app/2692570/Sonder/

Experience an innovative co-op adventure where two players have to work together. Engage in collaborative puzzle solving and dynamic combat with each player having unique abilities. Delve into a psychological narrative that explores the essence of humanity.

Finally Games consists of a group of twelve students from the Computer Game Development Program at Stockholm's University in Sweden. During the autumn and winter of 2023, as part of our Game Project course, we developed a game from scratch following a set of requirements and assigned roles.

Finally Games
--------------------------------------
DESIGN
--------------------------------------
Sarah Abbas - Animation
Martin Cervell - Sounds & Music
Nora Gate - 3D & 2D Art
Hannes Lemberg - Level Design
Carl Montgomerie - Game Design
Tova Wesström - VFX Art
--------------------------------------
PROGRAMMING
--------------------------------------
Carl Björkman - Gameplay
Ludvig Burud - Gameplay
Isabel Diaz Johansson - AI & System
Sofia Lindgren - UI & Network
Emil Lundström - Gameplay & AI
Jonathan Rubensson - AI & System
--------------------------------------

Trailer music by Ashiyari
